title: Atlas of Human Anatomy for the Artist
author: Stephen Rogers Peck
description: Stephen Rogers Peck's Atlas of Human Anatomy for the Artist remains unsurpassed as a manual for students. It includes sections on bones, muscles, surface anatomy, proportion, equilibrium, and locomotion.

title: The Wealthy Barber : Everyone's Common-Sense Guide to Becoming Financially Independent
author: David Chilton
description: David Chilton simplifies the complex puzzles of personal finance and helps you achieve financial independence.
